titleStmt.title: A censure about the rule of beleefe practised by the Protestants VVritten in Latine by the most Reuerend Father Valerian Magni of Milan of the order of the Minors, of the seraphical S. Francis, named Capucins. And translated into English by R. Q. Gentleman
titleStmt.author: Magni, Valeriano, 1587-1661.
R. Q.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Laurence Kellam [the younger], at the signe of the holie Lambe,

notesStmt.note: That Kellam is the younger is from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the holie Lambe
